Name: Brolio Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Deep ruby red colour. Fruity and spicy aromas with a delicate touch of boisé. The taste is warm and enveloping, ripe fruit, blackberry, black currant fruit, herbal sensations, tobacco on the palate. Excellent concentration and very well balanced bouquet. Long and persistent finish.

Name: Fronsac
Wine Description: The wines produced at Chateau la Vieille Cure are, by tradition are fine wines for raging. Most are best appreciated between 4 and 6 years. With signs of its wood aging that are balanced with firm tannins and concentrated black fruits, this is a solid wine, packed with tannins. There is a touch of dark chocolate as well as the ripe fruit.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Bright red, black pepper and red fruits berries and plenty of notes on the nose, good structure and elegance on the palate.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: Very intense and lively ruby red with a purple nuance. Ripe cherry and plum, delightful with its young fragrance. Intense and full entry ending with a pleasantly tannic and tangy finish. All courses of a meal, particularly grilled red meats.

Name: Red
Wine Description: Our Ménage à Trois exposes the fresh, ripe, jam like fruit that is the calling card of California wine. Forward, silky and soft, this delicious dalliance makes the perfect accompaniment for grilled meats or chicken.

Name: Tête-à-Tête
Wine Description: The has a deep boysenberry fruit suggestions, smoky/meaty/gamey complex flavor components that emphasize our terroir, and a lengthy creamy texture.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Colour: Ruby red with purple highlights and good intensity. Aroma: A nose mainly of black cherries, prunes, gooseberries, blackberries and spices. Flavour: Full-bodied, and rich. Balanced with fine tannins. A long and persistent finish.

Name: Rosso Dei Notri Toscana
Wine Description: Dark purple. Big, bold and ultra-clean with crashed dark cherries and berries on the nose, amazingly pure and fresh. Mid-full bodied with silky tanins, BIG fruit and balancing acidity. Medium finish.

Name: Gotes del Priorat
Wine Description: Cherry color with a garnet border. Aromas of mature red fruit, with wild herbs, mineral notes and spices. Potent in the mouth with delicious fruit and a touch of balsamic

Name: Montagne-Saint-Émilion
Wine Description: Ruby red with light violet hues on the edges. In the beginning, smoky flavors such as tobacco and oriental spices, they turn into dark fruit tones such as blackberries

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Blackberry, cherry and plum fruit aromas and flavors are accented by vanilla, allspice and cocoa. The richly textured mid-palate is balanced by medium tannins and a lengthy finish.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Dark cherry flavors, with intense nutmeg and clove aromatics. The classic Selby style is an opulent, yet elegant, with concentrated fruit on the front palate, a rich, velvety mouth feel and a lingering chocolate finish.

Name: Delicacé Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The flavors merge with baking spices and a bit of zest into a lush wine with silky tannins and a long fruity finish. The acid, tannin, and fruit are in perfect balance.

Name: Nerello Mascalese Vigne Vecchie
Wine Description: Ruby ​​red tending colour with aging to garnet. Aroma with fruity, intense, persistent, ethereal, tannic. Mineral, very persistent, strong charge tannins, great structure entry in the mouth opulent and powerful and tannic finish.

Name: Brouilly Reverdon
Wine Description: Intense mineral and spice accented dark berry, cherry pit and rose pastille aromas show very good clarity, with a suggestion of licorice adding depth. Displays deeper blackberry and bitter chocolate character on the palate, with tangy acidity and white pepper notes adding vivacity. Expands and becomes sweeter on the finish, which features lingering floral and spice cake qualities and subtle tannins.

Name: Montecastrillo Tinto
Wine Description: Manual collection vineyards Bodega selection. 100% Tempranillo. Average age of vines: 30 years Ageing: 4 months lees in French oak barrels

Name: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Wine Description: Roasted tomato and cherry flavours. Full-bodied and long lasting finish. Very polished and fine with fully developed floral and herbal top notes over the slightly rustic and wild red fruit tones. The tannins are brisk and crisp giving this a slightly muscular feel.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The red fruit brightens across the palate, picking up raspberry and spice with balance aromas. Soft and silky through the middle, this wine crescendo on the finish leaves a vibrant, juicy in the mouth, with proper acidity and a pleasant mouthfeel.

Name: Mofete Etna Rosso
Wine Description: Medium intensity ruby red colour. Spicy at the nose, with fresh wild herbs, rose and volcanic ash hints. Juicy, balanced and elegant in mouth, with a sapid/mineral finish.

Name: Côtes du Rhône
Wine Description: Intense ruby red colour. Rich perfume evoking small red fruit aromas of raspberry and cherry, and strawberry jam nose.A fruity wine, which goes down easily, revealing ripe red fruit flavours of strawberry and cherry, heightened by a touch of liquorice.

Name: VSC Assemblage
Wine Description: It has deep red color with some violet hues.It has aroma of great concentration of red fruits, with hints of raspberry and fresh plums that combine with elegant floral notes of violet. The nice acidity offers excellent balance and the great structure leads to a long, fresh finish.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Displaying cassis and plum fruit accompanied by delicate toasty notes. Enjoy with grilled meats.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright youthful garnet color of medium intensity. Sweet ripe cherry and red plum aromas with a hint of minerality and spicy pipe tobacco. Aromas are medium+ intensity. Aromas repeat as flavors, with a spicy lingering finish.

Name: I No Es Pituko Cabernet Franc
Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: The pallet is full with supple flavors of ripe plums, black cherry liquor, vanilla, chocolates with a long orange peel finish. is is a powerful wine from a hot year but it miraculously retains the great acid and structure that has made Sangiovese famous.is wine ovewhealms the senses , it will age beautifully

Name: Hard Odem Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve (סוביניון קברנה קשה אודם)
Grenache
Wine Description: Kirsch liqueur, blackberry, toasted spice, garrigue and hints of vanilla bean all flow nicely to a seamless, silky, yet decadently styled red that has fine tannin, and a blockbuster, heady finish.

Name: Barbera d’Alba
Wine Description: Intense ruby red colour with violet reflections. Intense winey bouquet recalling sour cherry and spices. Lively, generous, and full flavour.

Name: Techni Alipias Red
Wine Description: The Cabernet Sauvignon, and Agiorgitiko grapes that take part in the wine's varietal composition are vinified separately, by the classic red vinification method. After alcoholic and malolactic fermentation, the wine is aged for at least 12 months in French oak barrels. This wine has a deep purplish colour. Complex, beautifully open bouquet of cherries and plums, with notes of pepper and vanilla. In the mouth it is rich, mature, fleshy, well structured, with beautifully softened tannins. A delightful wine of real character, which can be consumed fresh or aged for several years. Serve at 16-18°C.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: Rich plum color. It reveals alluring aromas of black currant, cranberry and mocha that intermingle with spice and black pepper. Sweet wild berry fruit flavors on the entry, dry as the wine progresses across the palate. An opulent and luscious wine with the essence of dried blueberries and juicy plum that seamlessly transition to a lengthy finish with hints of dark chocolate and truffle tannins.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: The wine is fresh and light with a smooth texture. It features juicy blend of ripe strawberry, red raspberry, and cherry with a hint of chocolate and vanilla. Enjoy with black bean soup, pulled pork BBQ, or sweet potato fries.

Name: Rosso Pietro Barbera del Monferrato
Wine Description: Fruity aroma is reminiscent of cherry and blackberry, while its dry, frank and slightly salty taste releases a pleasant undertone of black cherry.

Name: Sonoma Valley Syrah
Wine Description: It is a mesmerizing complexity and depth of fruit that flows through to finish with a soft texture, subtle gaminess and toasty vanilla notes the wines will have a taste and smell of dark blue fruit like blackberries and blackcurrant, with a strong spicy side where one can find freshly ground pepper and other spices.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Delicate Pinot Noir aromatics and flavors. Tiny, perfect clusters of deeply colored fruit. Soft suggestions of violets and rose petals couple with notes of wild cherries and cola. Subtle cocoa and toasty oak notes closely follow the lasting fruit flavors, creating an earthy finish of both structure and finesse.

Name: Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: Opaque black/purple colour, with notes of crushed rock, white flowers, graphite, blueberry and cassis, the wine is tight and needs to be coaxed from the glass. It is medium to full-bodied, with an excruciatingly tough-textured finish.

Name: Cuvée de la Vigneronne Côtes du Rhône
Wine Description: The tight nose makes way to tight blue and black fruit in the mouth. There are fine, dusty tannins, black fruit in the finish which matches well with the acidity. With air the nice fruit takes on a touch of spice, cinnamon in the finish, and very mild ripeness.
